channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cosori's stainless steel air fryer wants to assuage your fear of microplastics
item.description: Home appliance company Cosori has released a stainless steel air fryer because why not. The Iconic Air Fryer debuted in all its shiny glory at Pepcom this week, a media showcase event ahead of CES. Cosori says the air fryer is meant to address a pain point in the market regarding consumer concern over heating food in plastic air fryers. The company's answer to this is a 6.5-quart stainless steel fryer with a ceramic, nonstick coating on all surfaces that come in contact with food. Iconic has a brushed metal finish that Cosori says is corrosion resistant. The controls and display for the fryer ...

item.title: Section 230 Doesn’t Cover Elon Musk’s Ass When It Comes to Deepfake Abuse, Senator Says
item.description: "States must step in to hold X and Musk accountable, if Trump’s DOJ won’t," Wyden said.

item.title: This WebUI vulnerability allows remote code execution - here's how to stay safe
item.description: Popular AI interface was plagued by an 8/10 bug, but a fix is now available.

item.title: What Went Into the Most Satisfying Scene in ‘Predator: Badlands’
item.description: Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi star in the sci-fi action film, which is now out on digital.

item.title: AI moves into the real world as companion robots and pets
item.description: Artificial intelligence doesn't always want to optimize your life or steal your job. Sometimes, AI just wants to be your friend. And while robot pets weren't the biggest stars of CES 2026, they've become more than just noise and are signaling how AI is apparently leaving our screens and taking on a physical presence in […]

item.title: Riot Games' 2XKO will hit consoles on January 20
item.description: Riot Games has a pretty long legacy as a PC gaming studio, but the company is spreading out into consoles with its newest title. 2XKO will land on consoles on January 20, to coincide with the start of its first season. The game will be available globally for the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S with cross-play support, allowing current players to access their existing progress on a PC account. The formula for most recent Riot projects (with the notable exception of Valorant), has been to take the extensive character roster from its long-standing League of Legends MOBA and place them into oth...

item.title: Meta Hits Pause on Ray-Ban Display Expansion to Europe and Canada
item.description: The company says it's a victim of its own success.

item.title: The PC version of 007 First Light requires lots of expensive RAM and VRAM to run at recommended settings
item.description: IO Interactive just revealed minimum and recommended specs for the PC build of 007 First Light. The company recommends 32GB of RAM and 12GB of VRAM. In a normal world, this wouldn't be news, as modern NVIDIA GPUs certainly have more than enough VRAM. However, we live in a world where AI companies gobble up lots of memory. This has caused newer cards to tick up in price, with more hikes to come. Older cards like the RTX 3070 just won't cut it, as that one ships with 8GB of VRAM. Standard RAM is also getting much more expensive, putting that 32GB out of reach for many gamers. In other words, pla...

item.title: PNY is releasing slim-sized NVIDIA RTX GPUs just as PC building becomes prohibitively expensive
item.description: If I were building a new PC today, I'd go for a small form factor mATX or ITX build. With companies like Fractal Design and Lian Li making cases that can fit modern GPUs without sacrificing on thermals, you don't need to settle for the old mid-tower monstrosities of yesteryear. And that's why PNY's new "Slim” model RTX 50-series designs caught my eye. All three variants, covering the 5070, 5070 Ti and 5080, are two slot cards with just a pair of 120mm fans for cooling. As a result, even the largest of the three new models, the 5080, is relatively svelte, coming in at 11.8-inches or 300mm long....

item.title: This robot pool cleaner lifts itself out of the water to charge
item.description: Mammotion, the company best known for its line of robot lawnmowers, is launching a robot pool cleaner that can take itself out of the water. As shown during CES 2026, the Spino S1 Pro comes with a robotic arm mounted to a docking station that sits at the edge of your pool. When the bot […]

item.title: Dozens of organizations fall victim to infostealers after failing to enforce MFA
item.description: 50 companies allowed access to cloud instances with just a password and were compromised with infostealers.

item.title: Resident Evil Village and Star Wars Outlaws join January's Game Pass additions
item.description: On Tuesday, Microsoft announced the first batch of incoming Game Pass titles for 2026. Star Wars Outlaws and Resident Evil Village headline the first wave of the January lineup.If you (perhaps wisely) held off on spending $70 on Ubisoft's first stab at a Star Wars game, here's your chance to try it for less. Star Wars Outlaws sets you loose in an open world as the young thief Kay Vess. The third-person action title includes melee, shooting and stealth. There’s even some speeder chases and space dogfights to scratch your (boilerplate) Star Wars itch. Does it do anything novel or innovative to j...

item.title: How World Cup champion Mario Götze built a parallel career as an angel investor
item.description: Companion M, Götze’s personal investment vehicle, now has a portfolio of more than 70 companies, two of which became unicorns in 2025

item.title: I had my hormones checked at CES 2026 — and it turns out I'm doing great
item.description: The Eli Hormometer checks your cortisol and progesterone levels and gives you your results in minutes. Here's how.

item.title: LG has released pricing for its new Sound Suite speaker lineup
item.description: On Monday, we went hands-on at CES with LG's new Sound Suite speakers featuring Dolby Atmos FlexConnect and now we have pricing for the entire lineup. The modular home audio system consists of four speakers that include a soundbar, surround speakers and a subwoofer. The centerpiece of the group is the H7 soundbar, which will retail for $1,000. The soundbar uses FlexConnect to optimize sound based on the layout of a room and its location therein. This is intended to solve for when a speaker can't be perfectly placed to deliver optimal sound, especially spatial audio. The H7 also has a feature L...

item.title: What It’s Like to Sit in a $12,000 AI Massage Chair?
item.description: I got to try a chair that's worth more than my (admittedly old) minivan.

item.title: Anker unveils a new lineup of chargers and docks at CES 2026
item.description: Anker dove into CES 2026 with a slew of announcements that bring new chargers and accessories under its umbrella. The new accessories include improved visual interfaces, faster Qi2 wireless charging and “upgraded ecosystems” that support the latest iPhones. Some of the latest devices are even available to buy right now. First up is the Anker Nano Charger with smart display, which features a tiny screen, 180-degree foldable prongs and provides up to 45W of power. The plug can identify the exact iPhone model connected and then deliver the right amount of power for your phone. Anker says the Nano...

item.title: Écrire sur une table avec des lunettes Ray-Ban ? La fonction bluffante dévoilée par Meta
item.description: Meta profite du CES 2026 pour muscler ses Ray-Ban Display. Au menu : un téléprompteur personnel dans le champ de vision et la capacité d'écrire des messages du bout des doigts sur n'importe quelle surface. Le futur est là, mais il faudra être patient.

item.title: ‘The Batman Part II’ Keeps Poaching MCU Alums
item.description: The Winter Soldier himself, Sebastian Stan, is reportedly joining his fellow 'Avengers' alum Scarlett Johansson in DC's Robert Pattinson-starring sequel.

item.title: Beatbot’s New Pool Cleaning Robot Uses AI to Find Pool Debris
item.description: Also, the company has updates on its sea turtle robot.

item.title: Power bank feature creep is out of control
item.description: There was a time not too long ago when buying a power bank was as easy as choosing the cheapest portable battery that could charge your phone and quickly slip into your pocket, purse, or backpack. The hardest part was deciding whether it was time to ditch USB-A ports. Recently, however, brands have been slathering […]

item.title: Navee's CES lineup includes a speedy e-scooter, a golf cart and... a seaplane?
item.description: The Chinese micromobility company Navee has some wild new stuff at CES 2026. The lineup is headlined by the UT5 Ultra X, a dual-motor e-scooter with an advertised top speed of 43 mph. And who among us isn't in the market for an auto-following golf cart and a seaplane?The flagship UT5 Ultra X is a sleek-looking e-scooter with a pair of 2,400W motors. Navee says it can reach a top speed of 43 mph and has a max range of 87 miles. (However, in the world of e-scooters, it's safe to expect the real-world range to be around half of what manufacturers promise.) It has a front and rear hydraulic suspen...

item.title: Énergie noire : et si l’Univers changeait de destin sous nos yeux ?
item.description: Une équipe de chercheurs parmi lesquels se trouve l'un des découvreurs de l'énergie noire, ou pour le moins de l'expansion accélérée de l'espace, a trouvé une façon plus rigoureuse de l'étudier. Les nouveaux résultats obtenus vont toujours dans le sens d'une remise en cause du destin du cosmos...

item.title: Les trois meilleurs smartphones de l’année 2025
item.description: L'année 2025 a été un tournant, marquée par l'intégration massive de l'IA dans nos smartphones. Après avoir testé et comparé des dizaines de modèles cette année, nous avons sélectionné la crème de la crème. Voici notre podium des trois smartphones incontournables de 2025.

item.title: Deepfakes of Maduro are a reminder that AI content thrives in political chaos
item.description: “Trust is hanging by a thread” In moments of political chaos, deepfakes and AI-generated content can thrive. Case in point: the online reaction to the US government’s shocking operation in Venezuela over the weekend, which included multiple airstrikes and a clandestine mission that ended with the capture of the country’s president, Nicolás Maduro, and his wife. They were soon charged with narcoterrorism, along with other crimes, and they’re currently being held at a federal prison in New York. ...

item.title: Roborock lance le F25 Ace Pro : 25 000 Pa et une technologie de mousse inédite
item.description: Le problème des aspirateurs-laveurs, c'est souvent l'humidité résiduelle. Avec le F25 Ace Pro, Roborock change de fusil d'épaule. Au lieu d'inonder le sol, il projette une mousse ultra-dense. Ajoutez à cela une puissance brute de 25 000 Pa, et vous avez sur le papier une machine de guerre contre les taches de gras.

item.title: The Morning After: Sony Honda’s new car, Lego’s first CES press event and more
item.description: Welcome to your first CES edition of TMA, attempting (almost futilely) to distill the biggest product reveals and announcements. Despite two days of briefings and conferences, today is merely day one. However, we’ve already seen Sony Honda reveal its next car — and the Afeela 1 isn’t yet on sale. We’ve got a deep dive on what we’ve seen so far, right here. AMD announced new Ryzen AI 400 laptop processors and updated desktop chips, including the Ryzen 7 9850X3D, with a new focus broadly on AI processing improvements. NVIDIA had a lengthy, dense press conference showing off its dominance in AI t...

item.title: New report on AI adoption warns workers could face more complex responsibilities for lower pay
item.description: AI could lead to productivity, unemployment, and health gaps – we should focus on sustainable human-AI collaboration.

item.title: Threads is developing in-message games
item.description: Launching in-message games would give Threads an edge over competitors like X and Bluesky, which don’t offer built-in games.

item.title: Quand le tableau de bord devient une toile géante : comment ces mini-projecteurs pourraient éliminer les écrans des voitures
item.description: Au CES de Las Vegas, l'équipementier Aumovio dévoile un système de projection qui transforme radicalement l'habitacle. Exit les écrans : place à une surface d'affichage qui s'étend sur toute la largeur de la planche de bord, promettant une expérience visuelle immersive.

item.title: Amazons 55-inch 4-Series Fire TV is $100 off for the first time ever
item.description: The Amazon 55-inch 4-Series 4K TV is down to its best price ever of $359.99 at Amazon. Use the code SAVE100 at checkout.

item.title: Zenbook et Vivobook 2026 : comment Asus veut contrer le MacBook Air avec l’IA
item.description: Poids plume de moins d'un kilo, autonomie solide et puces Snapdragon X2 Elite : Asus bouscule les codes de la mobilité avec sa nouvelle gamme Zenbook et Vivobook.

item.title: Finis les PC pros moches ? Asus lève le voile sur l’ExpertBook Ultra
item.description: Moins d'un kilo, écran OLED Tandem et finitions céramique : Asus veut réinventer le PC pro avec l'ExpertBook Ultra, une machine élégante taillée pour l'ère de l'IA.

item.title: Qualcomm Wants You to Know That Its New Car Chip Has Multitasking Baked In
item.description: Qualcomm demoed its Flex SoC that controls driver assistance and safety features at the same time as in-car entertainment in cars.

item.title: Aqara’s Latest Presence Sensor Knows When You’re Lying Down or Sitting Up
item.description: The Spatial Multi-Sensor FP400 takes mmWave presence sensing a step further.

item.title: On a vu les nouveau Zenbook DUO, le génial PC d’Asus à deux écrans qui s’améliore grandement
item.description: À l’approche du CES 2026, Asus dévoile un Zenbook DUO repensé : double écran OLED, châssis affiné et charnière revue pour plus de confort et de robustesse. Ce PC portable à deux écrans vise toujours la productivité maximale, mais avec un design bien plus abouti.

item.title: CES 2026: Asus new 16-inch laptop is lighter than a 13-inch MacBook Air
item.description: The ultralight Asus Zenbook A16 debuted at CES 2026 Tuesday. It's a 16-inch version of the company's award-winning MacBook Air competitor.

item.title: This 16-inch laptop is so light I can easily lift it with three fingers
item.description: Asus' Zenbook A14 that debuted at last year's CES is now getting a bigger sibling for CES 2026. The new Asus Zenbook A16 is a 16-inch counterpart to refreshed Zenbook A14, both packing Qualcomm Snapdragon X2 Elite processors. The two Zenbook A models are very similar, both sporting OLED displays, two USB 4 ports, one […]

item.title: Asus’ Zenbook Duo dual-screen laptop gets Intel’s new chip and a more seamless hinge
item.description: The Asus Zenbook Duo is getting a chip upgrade, an overhauled hinge design, and a big battery upgrade for CES 2026. The new dual-screen laptop will get Intel Panther Lake when it launches later in Q1 2026, though its pricing isn't finalized. But the most noticeable change is to its finish and its hinge. The […]

item.title: Asus made a GoPro-inspired ProArt PX13 laptop
item.description: Asus is announcing a new ProArt PX13 convertible laptop and ProArt PZ14 detachable tablet for CES 2026. The PX13 comes in two versions: a standard model and a GoPro Edition. Both feature a stylus-compatible 13.3-inch 2880 x 1800 OLED display, dial pad control built into the trackpad, and AMD's "Strix Halo" Ryzen AI Max APU […]

item.title: MSI's newest laptop beats Apple's MacBook Pro on an all-important metric — Prestige 16 lasts 30+ hours on video playback and weighs only 1.59kg
item.description: MSI’s Prestige 16 offers professional performance with long battery life, OLED display, lightweight aluminum chassis, and advanced input including keyboard and stylus.

item.title: The ASUS Zenbook Duo got a fantastic redesign for CES 2026
item.description: The ASUS Zenbook Duo was easily one of my favorite laptops of 2024 as it was the first dual-screen notebook actually worth buying. But now at CES 2026, ASUS has given the second-gen model a complete revamp with practically all the upgrades and tweaks I’ve been hoping for. Like the rest of the Zenbook line, the 2026 Duo is getting ASUS’ Ceraluminum treatment on its lid, bottom and kickstand, which not only looks great but it adds an extra bit of durability and scratch resistance. There’s also an improved magnetic latch system and Bluetooth connection for its detachable keyboard to help keep it ...

item.title: Asus ExpertBook Ultra : le PC de moins de 1 kg qui veut faire oublier le MacBook Air
item.description: Désireux de dépoussiérer sa gamme ExpertBook pour les professionnels, Asus a dévoilé un nouveau modèle au suffixe "Ultra" lors du CES 2026 de Las Vegas. Un ultraportable avec écran Oled qui pourrait bien relancer Asus sur ce segment.

item.title: Quand deux écrans Oled qui n’en font plus qu’un : on a vu le nouveau Zenbook Duo d’Asus
item.description: Le Zenbook Duo de chez Asus se refait une santé en 2026 avec deux nouvelles dalles Oled encore plus lumineuses, un nouveau châssis plus fin et une fiche technique dernier cri.

item.title: We now know the first TV brands that will support Dolby Vision 2 – and one has been very prolific at CES 2026
item.description: After being revealed in 2025, Dolby Vision 2 plans have been announced at CES 2026, including which TV brands will get the new HDR format.

item.title: The new Skims Team USA collection is the ‘Juicy Couture’ of Olympic partnerships
item.description: It’s Team USA’s cheekiest collection yet. Kim Kardashian’s apparel brand Skims is outfitting American athletes at the Olympics for the fourth time in a row, and this year’s collection is its cheekiest one yet.

item.title: ‘We’re really pleased with the reception.’ Meta’s Display smart glasses are a hit — but that’s not good news if you want a pair
item.description: The Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses are so popular that their international launch is on ‘pause’.

item.title: Immerse yourself in your favorite games with the 27-inch Alienware gaming monitor at its lowest price
item.description: As of Jan. 6, get the 27-inch Alienware gaming monitor for its lowest price yet.
